name: Korwe
overview:
Our products help companies get at data in the enterprise so that it can be personalized. We address the need for companies to organize and repurpose their data for mobile in a way that delights their customers. Gartner defined the MEAP market in Dec 2009 to be $1bil growing annually at 15-20%. (The Global Mobile Enterprise Application Platform market will reach $1.6 billion in 2014.) Using our product is cheaper and quicker than doing it yourself and we are cheaper than our competitors. Our solution also provides your managers with peace of mind knowing that your services can scale with user number and service complexity and that we support out product. Our product has a unique way of being able to search data that is patented.

We have clients with mission critical systems that depend on our product, and we have clients whose services are highly rated due to work we have done for them.
